mapper.select: SELECT * FROM students WHERE isDeleted = false
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO students(name, kanaName, nickname, email, region, age, gender, remark, isDeleted) VALUES (#{name}, #{kanaName}, #{nickname}, #{email}, #{region}, #{age}, #{gender}, #{remark}, false)
INSERT INTO students_courses(id, student_id, course_name, start_date, end_date) VALUES (#{id}, #{studentId}, #{courseName}, #{startDate}, #{endDate})
mapper.update: UPDATE students SET name = #{name}, kanaName = #{kanaName}, nickname = #{nickname}, email = #{email}, region = #{region}, age = #{age}, gender = #{gender}, remark = #{remark}, isDeleted = #{isDeleted} WHERE id = #{id}
